overview: Meenakshi Singh is a Silicon Valley veteran with more than 25 plus years of experience in engineering and technology, product development, corporate management and human resources. Meenakshi was recently CFO of Ankeena Neworks since inception and saw through the acquisition of Ankeena by Juniper Networks. Prior to Ankeena she was VP of Finance and Administration at Sonoa Systems. She previously worked as VP of Finance and Operations at Cortina Systems, where she was instrumental in creating and managing U.S. and Canadian corporations including a successful acquisition of a company in India. Prior to that, she was with the Corporate Business Development, Mergers and Acquisitions group at Cisco Systems and as VP of Finance and Administration of StratumOne Communications (subsequently acquired by Cisco Systems in 1999). Meenakshi is also involved with several start-ups either as an Angel Investor, advisor, or acting CFO.
